dataList.name: Doubt
dataList.desc: When this unit defeats an enemy with an Attack Skill, deal 10 SP damage to all enemies.

dataList.name: Life
dataList.desc: When Staggering or Defeating an enemy with an Attack Skill, this unit heals 50 HP (Both Core and Part)

dataList.name: Pain
dataList.desc: If an ally is defeated in Combat, gana 1 Bind, 1 Attack Power Up, and 3 Damage Up next turn.

dataList.name: Weakness
dataList.desc: If this unit dies, apply 5 Damage Up next turn to all enemies. This effect does not stack.

dataList.name: Irresponsible
dataList.desc: If there are no other allies than Dawn of Green - Doubt - Î´, double the effects of 'Doubt' and 'Life'.

dataList.name: Beginning
dataList.desc: If this unit is alive, no enemies are generated at Turn End.
